content.raw:
1. I'll try that and will report how that works out

2. It works just fine (I'm running this in the lab). There should be no bad consequences. This is since in ```Plugin.__init__``` only settings are passed. The plugin gets the information about queue etc. in ```plugin_setup_complete``` which has not moved so I don't think this breaks anything and would stick to this.

3. Yeah I'll do that.

Update: switched to using ```QTabWidget.tabText()``` instead of ```.tab_name``` and ```.device_name```. And added a new ui file for PluginTabs.
